1.name: CanBeShotInVehicle
1.rockstarDescription: script can stop peds being shot when driving vehicle (including exposed ones like bikes)

2.name: NoCriticalHits
2.rockstarDescription: ped cannot be killed by a single bullet

3.name: DrownsInWater
3.rockstarDescription: does this ped drown or swim?

4.name: DrownsInSinkingVehicle
4.rockstarDescription: does this ped take damage whilst in a sinking vehicle?

5.name: DiesInstantlyWhenSwimming
5.rockstarDescription: Ped cannot swim and will die as soon as they are required to swim

6.name: HasBulletProofVest
6.rockstarDescription: is this ped wearing a bullet proof vest

7.name: UpperBodyDamageAnimsOnly
7.rockstarDescription: force ped to play only upper body damage anims from weapons

8.name: NeverFallOffSkis
8.rockstarDescription: Ped will never fall over on skis

12.name: DoesntListenToPlayerGroupCommands
12.rockstarDescription: script can set this so ped will be in players group but not reacting to commands

15.name: SetDelayedWeaponAsCurrent
15.rockstarDescription: when the peds delayed weapon finally loads, set it as the peds current weapon

16.name: KeepTasksAfterCleanUp
16.rockstarDescription: If true ped will carry on with task even after script ped cleanup

17.name: BlockNonTemporaryEvents
17.rockstarDescription: ! Set to block any events that might interrupt the currently running tasks.

20.name: AllowMedicsToReviveMe
20.rockstarDescription: never allow this ped to be revived
20.rockstarCodeComment: If this ped dies medics will be dispatched, false by default for mission peds, the ped wont be revived

21.name: MoneyHasBeenGivenByScript
21.rockstarDescription: script can give specific amount of money to ped (script peds don't drop any money by default)

22.name: NotAllowedToCrouch
22.rockstarDescription: Is this ped allowed to crouch at all?

23.name: DeathPickupsPersist
23.rockstarDescription: script command to control what type of pickups are created when ped dies

24.name: IgnoreSeenMelee
24.rockstarDescription: script command so ped doesn't stop to watch fights

25.name: ForceDieIfInjured
25.rockstarDescription: script command so missions peds die if injured

26.name: DontDragMeOutCar
26.rockstarDescription: force this ped can't be carjacked
26.rockstarCodeComment: Prevents a ped from being able to be dragged out of a car

27.name: StayInCarOnJack
27.rockstarDescription: script sets this to keep peds in car when the player steals it

28.name: ForceDieInCar
28.rockstarDescription: don't fall out car if killed

29.name: GetOutUndriveableVehicle
29.rockstarDescription: script can stop peds automatically getting out of vehicle when it's upside down or undrivable(for races and stuff)
29.rockstarCodeComment: Script can stop peds automatically getting out of car when it's upside down or undrivable, defaults to true

30.name: WillRemainOnBoatAfterMissionEnds
30.rockstarDescription: script can stop peds automatically leaving boats when they become random chars, after a script quits

31.name: DontStoreAsPersistent
31.rockstarDescription: Some peds (like mission peds) should not be stored as persistent.

32.name: WillFlyThroughWindscreen
32.rockstarCodeComment: Ped will fly through the vehicle windscreen upon a forward impact at high velocity

34.name: HasHelmet
34.rockstarCodeComment: Ped has a helmet (/ The PedHelmetComponent has put the helmet on the ped via "put on" animations)

35.name: UseHelmet
35.rockstarDescription: will the ped try to put on their helmet?

36.name: DontTakeOffHelmet
36.rockstarDescription: the ped will not take off their helmet (if equipped) while this is set
36.rockstarCodeComment: Disable the ped taking off his helmet automatically

40.name: PedGeneratesDeadBodyEvents
40.rockstarDescription: Generates shocking events as if dead

42.name: DontInfluenceWantedLevel
42.rockstarDescription: Can do any crime against this character and the cops turn a blind eye (no crime reported)
42.rockstarCodeComment: Can do any crime against this character and the cops turn a blind eye (no crime reported)

44.name: DisableLockonToRandomPeds
44.rockstarCodeComment: Disable lockon to random ambient peds

46.name: DisableHornAudioWhenDead
46.rockstarDescription: Disable the horn when a ped dies in the car and has his head against the wheel
46.rockstarCodeComment: Disable horn audio when the ped dies and rests his head on top of the steering wheel

48.name: BlockWeaponSwitching
48.rockstarDescription: Disable weapon switching while this is set

49.name: BlockGroupPedAimedAtResponse
49.rockstarDescription: Disable the behaviour which causes player-group peds to crouch when the player aims at them

50.name: WillFollowLeaderAnyMeans
50.rockstarDescription: Basically defines whether group peds will use cars etc to follow their leader (default=false)

51.name: BlippedByScript
51.rockstarDescription: Set to true if the char has ever been blipped, not 100% correct so don't use it on anything sensitive.

52.name: DrawRadarVisualField
52.rockstarDescription: Draw this peds visual field in the stealth radar

53.name: StopWeaponFiringOnImpact
53.rockstarDescription: Set to true to stop the peds weapon firing on impact when they drop it

54.name: DissableAutoFallOffTests
54.rockstarDescription: Set to true to stop ped scanning for things to fall off when shot by the player

55.name: SteerAroundDeadBodies
55.rockstarDescription: Forces peds to steer around dead bodies, the default is false.

56.name: ConstrainToNavMesh
56.rockstarDescription: Ped is constrained to navmesh's surface

57.name: SyncingAnimatedProps
57.rockstarDescription: Set this to true if the ped should attempt to synchronise the animations of an attached prop to its movement anims

61.name: WasStanding
61.rockstarDescription: was the ped standing last frame

66.name: WasSwimming
66.rockstarDescription: was the ped swimming in water last frame

69.name: KilledByStealth
69.rockstarDescription: Determines if this ped was killed by a stealth action

70.name: KilledByTakedown
70.rockstarDescription: Determines if this ped was killed by a takedown action

71.name: Knockedout
71.rockstarDescription: Determines if this ped was finished with a knockout action

72.name: ClearRadarBlipOnDeath
72.rockstarDescription: so peds automatically given blips will clear them again when they die (mainly used for peds recruited into players group)

73.name: JustGotOffTrain
73.rockstarDescription: train code uses this when grabbing random peds to get in trains

74.name: JustGotOnTrain
74.rockstarDescription: train code uses this when grabbing random peds to get in trains

75.name: UsingCoverPoint
75.rockstarDescription: set to true when a ped is in process of using a cover point

77.name: KnockedUpIntoAir
77.rockstarDescription: has ped been knocked up into the air by a car collision

78.name: IsAimingGun
78.rockstarCodeComment: Is set when a ped is performing an aim task

79.name: HasJustLeftCar
79.rockstarDescription: used by navigation to force scan for cars collisions

85.name: HasBeenBumpedInCar
85.rockstarDescription: Has this ped been bumped by a car while driving?

86.name: InWaterTaskQuitToClimbLadder
86.rockstarDescription: The in-water task has just quit in response to a ladder-climb request

87.name: NMTwoHandedWeaponBothHandsConstrained
87.rockstarDescription: when using physical 2-handed weapons, both hands have been latched to the gun model (used when sending ConfigureCharacter to NM)

93.name: ForcePedLoadCover
93.rockstarDescription: Set by the script to force a ped to load cover

96.name: JustLeftCarNotCheckedForDoors
96.rockstarDescription: Set when a ped exits a car.  The first time he he moves he should check for door obstructions.

99.name: UsingCrouchedPedCapsule
99.rockstarDescription: Set to indicate that the ped's bounds are in the crouched configuration

100.name: HasDeadPedBeenReported
100.rockstarDescription: Whether this ped has been investigated (for dead peds)

101.name: ForcedAim
101.rockstarDescription: If set, we will always behave like we have the aim trigger pressed
101.rockstarCodeComment: If set, we will always behave like we have the aim trigger pressed, also works for AI in cars

102.name: SteersAroundPeds
102.rockstarDescription: Enables/disables the low-level steering behaviour around peds and objects

103.name: SteersAroundObjects
103.rockstarDescription: Enables/disables the low-level steering behaviour around peds and objects

104.name: OpenDoorArmIK
104.rockstarDescription: Set if the ped should enable open door arm IK
104.rockstarCodeComment: Set if the ped should enable open door arm IK

105.name: ForceReload
105.rockstarDescription: Force a reload of the current weapon

106.name: DontActivateRagdollFromVehicleImpact
106.rockstarDescription: Blocks ragdoll activation when hit by a vehicle
106.rockstarCodeComment: Blocks ragdoll activation when hit by a vehicle

107.name: DontActivateRagdollFromBulletImpact
107.rockstarDescription: Blocks ragdoll activation when hit by a bullet
107.rockstarCodeComment: Blocks ragdoll activation when hit by a bullet

108.name: DontActivateRagdollFromExplosions
108.rockstarDescription: Blocks ragdoll activation when hit by an explosive
108.rockstarCodeComment: Blocks ragdoll activation when hit by an explosive

109.name: DontActivateRagdollFromFire
109.rockstarDescription: Blocks ragdoll activation when set on fire
109.rockstarCodeComment: Blocks ragdoll activation when set on fire

111.name: IsBeingDraggedToSafety
111.rockstarDescription: Whether this ped is being dragged to safety

112.name: HasBeenDraggedToSafety
112.rockstarDescription: Whether this ped has been dragged to safety

113.name: KeepWeaponHolsteredUnlessFired
113.rockstarDescription: Ignores the creation of the weapon object unless the gun is shot.
113.rockstarCodeComment: Will keep the peds weapon holstered until they shoot or change weapons

114.name: ForceScriptControlledKnockout
114.rockstarDescription: Forces a melee knockout state for the victim ped
114.rockstarCodeComment: Forces a melee knockout state for the victim ped

115.name: FallOutOfVehicleWhenKilled
115.rockstarDescription: Forces a ped to fall out of a vehicle when killed
115.rockstarCodeComment: Forces a ped in a vehicle to collapse out onto the floor (TaskDyingDead launches TaskExitVehicle)

116.name: GetOutBurningVehicle
116.rockstarDescription: If set, a ped will escape a burning vehicle they are inside
116.rockstarCodeComment: If set, a ped will escape a burning vehicle they are inside, defaults to true

117.name: BumpedByPlayer
117.rockstarDescription: Whether this ped has been bumped by the player.

118.name: RunFromFiresAndExplosions
118.rockstarDescription: If set, a ped will run away from fires or potential explosions
118.rockstarCodeComment: If set, a ped will escape a burning vehicle they are inside, defaults to true

119.name: TreatAsPlayerDuringTargeting
119.rockstarDescription: If set, the ped will be given the same boost a player gets in the targeting scoring system.
119.rockstarCodeComment: If set, the ped will be given the same boost a player gets in the targeting scoring system

120.name: IsHandCuffed
120.rockstarDescription: indicates if the ped is currently hand cuffed

121.name: IsAnkleCuffed
121.rockstarDescription: indicates if the ped is currently ankle cuffed

122.name: DisableMelee
122.rockstarDescription: Disables the melee for a particular ped
122.rockstarCodeComment: Disable melee for a ped (only supported for player right now)

123.name: DisableUnarmedDrivebys
123.rockstarDescription: Disables unarmed driveby taunts for ped
123.rockstarCodeComment: Disable unarmed driveby taunts for a ped

124.name: JustGetsPulledOutWhenElectrocuted
124.rockstarDescription: MP only, if ped is electrocuted or rubber bulletted, players jacking the ped will just pull them out
124.rockstarCodeComment: MP only - if this ped is tased or rubber bulleted in a vehicle and a ped jacks them, the jacker will only pull the ped out

126.name: WillNotHotwireLawEnforcementVehicle
126.rockstarDescription: True if the ped will skip hotwiring a law enforcement vehicle if it needs to be hotwired
126.rockstarCodeComment: If set, the ped won't hotwire a lawenforcement vehicle

127.name: WillCommandeerRatherThanJack
127.rockstarDescription: True if the ped will try to commandeer a vehicle rather than jack if possible
127.rockstarCodeComment: If set, the ped will play commandeering anims rather than jacking if available

128.name: CanBeAgitated
128.rockstarDescription: True if the ped will respond to agitation events
128.rockstarCodeComment: If set, the ped can be agitated

129.name: ForcePedToFaceLeftInCover
129.rockstarDescription: If set ped will turn to face left in cover
129.rockstarCodeComment: If set ped will turn to face left in cover

130.name: ForcePedToFaceRightInCover
130.rockstarDescription: If set ped will turn to face right in cover
130.rockstarCodeComment: If set ped will turn to face right in cover

131.name: BlockPedFromTurningInCover
131.rockstarDescription: If set ped will not turn in cover, unless one of the force flags is set
131.rockstarCodeComment: If set ped will not turn in cover, unless one of the force flags is set

132.name: KeepRelationshipGroupAfterCleanUp
132.rockstarDescription: Will allow the ped to keep their relationship group after mission cleanup as opposed to going back to default
132.rockstarCodeComment: Ped keeps their relationship group when the mission is cleaned up or they are marked as no longer needed

133.name: ForcePedToBeDragged
133.rockstarDescription: Forces Ped To Loop Try Locked Door Anim In Order To Be Dragged Along When Vehicle Moves
133.rockstarCodeComment: Ped will loop the try locked door anim when they get to the door in order for them to automatically be dragged along

134.name: PreventPedFromReactingToBeingJacked
134.rockstarDescription: Ped doesn't react when being jacked
134.rockstarCodeComment: Ped doesn't react when being jacked

135.name: IsScuba
135.rockstarDescription: indicates if the ped is currently equipped for scuba

136.name: WillArrestRatherThanJack
136.rockstarDescription: For cops arresting peds in vehicles

137.name: RemoveDeadExtraFarAway
137.rockstarDescription: We must be further away before ped polulation remove this ped when it is dead
137.rockstarCodeComment: We must be further away before ped polulation remove this ped when it is dead

138.name: RidingTrain
138.rockstarDescription: True if the ped is riding a train

139.name: ArrestResult
139.rockstarDescription: True if the arrest task succeeded
139.rockstarCodeComment: If set, the ped arrest task completed successfully

140.name: CanAttackFriendly
140.rockstarDescription: True allows this ped to attack peds theya re friendly with
140.rockstarCodeComment: True allows this ped to attack peds they are friendly with

141.name: WillJackAnyPlayer
141.rockstarDescription: True if this player ped can jack any other player (MP Only)
141.rockstarCodeComment: MP only, if set this ped will be allowed to jack any player peds, regardless of relationship

142.name: BumpedByPlayerVehicle
142.rockstarDescription: Whether this ped has been bumped by a player vehicle.

143.name: DodgedPlayerVehicle
143.rockstarDescription: Whether this ped has just dodged a player vehicle.

144.name: WillJackWantedPlayersRatherThanStealCar
144.rockstarDescription: True if this player will jack wanted passengers rather than try to steal a car (cops arresting crims) (MP Only)
144.rockstarCodeComment: MP only, True if this player will jack hated players rather than try to steal a car (cops arresting crims)

145.name: NoCopWantedAggro
145.rockstarDescription: If this flag is set on a cap, skip some of the code that would normally make them extra aggressive and alert.

146.name: DisableLadderClimbing
146.rockstarDescription: If this flag is set on a ped it will not scan for or climb ladders
146.rockstarCodeComment: If this flag is set on a ped it will not scan for or climb ladders

147.name: StairsDetected
147.rockstarDescription: If this flag is set on a ped it has detected stairs

148.name: SlopeDetected
148.rockstarDescription: If this flag is set on a ped it has detected a slope

149.name: HelmetHasBeenShot
149.rockstarDescription: If this flag is set on a ped it's helmet has been damaged

150.name: CowerInsteadOfFlee
150.rockstarDescription: If set, the ped will cower in place rather than flee, used. Used for scenarios in confined spaces.
150.rockstarCodeComment: If set the ped should cower instead of fleeing

151.name: CanActivateRagdollWhenVehicleUpsideDown
151.rockstarDescription: If set the ped will be allowed to ragdoll when the vehicle they are in gets turned upside down if the seat supports it.
151.rockstarCodeComment: If set the ped will be allowed to ragdoll when the vehicle they are in gets turned upside down if the seat supports it

152.name: AlwaysRespondToCriesForHelp
152.rockstarDescription: If set, the ped will respond to CEventInjuredCryForHelp regardless if it is allied with the injured ped.
152.rockstarCodeComment: If set the ped will respond to cries for help even if not friends with the injured ped.

153.name: DisableBloodPoolCreation
153.rockstarCodeComment: If set the ped will not create a blood pool when dead

154.name: ShouldFixIfNoCollision
154.rockstarDescription: If set, the ped will be fixed if there is no collision around.
154.rockstarCodeComment: If set, the ped will be fixed if there is no collision around.

155.name: CanPerformArrest
155.rockstarDescription: If set, the ped can perform arrests on peds that can be arrested
155.rockstarCodeComment: If set, the ped can perform arrests on peds that can be arrested

156.name: CanPerformUncuff
156.rockstarDescription: If set, the ped can uncuff peds that are handcuffed
156.rockstarCodeComment: If set, the ped can uncuff peds that are handcuffed

157.name: CanBeArrested
157.rockstarDescription: If set, the ped may be arrested
157.rockstarCodeComment: If set, the ped can be arrested

158.name: MoverConstrictedByOpposingCollisions
158.rockstarDescription: If set, the ped's mover is getting collisions from opposing sides.

159.name: PlayerPreferFrontSeatMP
159.rockstarDescription: When true, Prefer the front seat when getting in a car with buddies.
159.rockstarCodeComment: When true, Prefer the front seat when getting in a car with buddies.

166.name: IsInjured
166.rockstarDescription: When true, the ped will use injured movement anim sets and getup animations.

167.name: DontEnterVehiclesInPlayersGroup
167.rockstarDescription: When true, will follow the player around if in their group but wont enter vehicles.
167.rockstarCodeComment: When true, will follow the player around if in their group but wont enter vehicles.

168.name: SwimmingTasksRunning
168.rockstarDescription: stronger than IsSwimming, persists so long as the tasks are active

169.name: PreventAllMeleeTaunts
169.rockstarDescription: Disable all melee taunts for this particular ped
169.rockstarCodeComment: Disable all melee taunts for this particular ped

170.name: ForceDirectEntry
170.rockstarDescription: Will force this ped to use the direct entry point for any vehicle they try to enter, or warp in
170.rockstarCodeComment: Will force this ped to use the direct entry point for any vehicle they try to enter, or warp in

171.name: AlwaysSeeApproachingVehicles
171.rockstarDescription: This ped will always see approaching vehicles (even from behind).
171.rockstarCodeComment: This ped will always see approaching vehicles (even from behind).

172.name: CanDiveAwayFromApproachingVehicles
172.rockstarDescription: This ped can dive away from approaching vehicles.
172.rockstarCodeComment: This ped can dive away from approaching vehicles.

173.name: AllowPlayerToInterruptVehicleEntryExit
173.rockstarDescription: Will allow player to interrupt a peds scripted entry/exit task as if they had triggered it themselves
173.rockstarCodeComment: Will allow player to interrupt a peds scripted entry/exit task as if they had triggered it themselves

174.name: OnlyAttackLawIfPlayerIsWanted
174.rockstarDescription: This ped won't attack cops unless the player is wanted.
174.rockstarCodeComment: This ped will only attack cops if the player is wanted

175.name: PlayerInContactWithKinematicPed
175.rockstarDescription: Gets set to true if the player ped is colliding against a ped in kinematic mode.

176.name: PlayerInContactWithSomethingOtherThanKinematicPed
176.rockstarDescription: Gets set to true if the player ped is colliding against something which isn't a ped in kinematic mode.

177.name: PedsJackingMeDontGetIn
177.rockstarDescription: If set any ped jacking this ped will not get in as part of the jack.
177.rockstarCodeComment: If set the ped will not get in as part of the jack

179.name: PedIgnoresAnimInterruptEvents
179.rockstarDescription: AI peds only, will not early out of anims
179.rockstarCodeComment: AI peds only, will not early out of anims, default behaviour is to exit as early as possible

180.name: IsInCustody
180.rockstarDescription: Signifies a player is in custody
180.rockstarCodeComment: Any targeting LoS checks will fail if any materials with 'see through' materials found.

181.name: ForceStandardBumpReactionThresholds
181.rockstarDescription: By default, armed and friendly peds have increased resistance to being bumped by players and friendly vehicles. Setting this flag will make them use the standard thresholds instead.
181.rockstarCodeComment: Setting this on an armed or buddy ped will make him more likely to perform an nm reaction when bumped by a player, friendly vehicle or ragdolling ped.

182.name: LawWillOnlyAttackIfPlayerIsWanted
182.rockstarDescription: If set, this ped can only be attacked by law if the player is wanted
182.rockstarCodeComment: If set on a ped, law peds will only attack if the local player is wanted

183.name: IsAgitated
183.rockstarDescription: If set, this ped is agitated.

184.name: PreventAutoShuffleToDriversSeat
184.rockstarDescription: MP only, prevents passenger from auto shuffling over to drivers seat if it becomes free.
184.rockstarCodeComment: Prevents passenger from auto shuffling over to drivers seat if it becomes free

185.name: UseKinematicModeWhenStationary
185.rockstarDescription: When enabled, the ped will continually set the kinematic mode reset flag when stationary.
185.rockstarCodeComment: When enabled, the ped will continually set the kinematic mode reset flag when stationary.

186.name: EnableWeaponBlocking
186.rockstarDescription: When enabled, Non-player peds can use WeaponBlocking behaviors

188.name: DisableHurt
188.rockstarDescription: Will prevent the peds go into hurt combat mode
188.rockstarCodeComment: Set to disable the combat hurt mode

189.name: PlayerIsWeird
189.rockstarDescription: Should this player ped periodically generate shocking events for being weird.
189.rockstarCodeComment: Should this player ped periodically generate shocking events for being weird

190.name: PedHadPhoneConversation
190.rockstarDescription: Has this ped had a phone conversation before.

191.name: BeganCrossingRoad
191.rockstarDescription: Indicates ped started crossing the road in case of interruption.

193.name: DoNothingWhenOnFootByDefault
193.rockstarDescription: Do nothing when on foot by default
193.rockstarCodeComment: Do nothing when on foot, by default

194.name: UsingScenario
194.rockstarDescription: Set when the ped is using a scenario. Call CPed::UpdateSpatialArrayTypeFlags() if changing.

195.name: VisibleOnScreen
195.rockstarDescription: Set when the ped is visible on screen, as determined by CPedAILodManager.

196.name: DontCollideWithKinematic
196.rockstarDescription: If true, the ped will not collide with other kinematic peds.

197.name: ActivateOnSwitchFromLowPhysicsLod
197.rockstarDescription: If set, activate physics when switching from low to regular physics LOD.

198.name: DontActivateRagdollOnPedCollisionWhenDead
198.rockstarDescription: Peds with this flag set won't be allowed to reactivate their ragdoll when hit by another ragdoll.
198.rockstarCodeComment: Peds with this flag set won't be allowed to reactivate their ragdoll when hit by another ragdoll.

199.name: DontActivateRagdollOnVehicleCollisionWhenDead
199.rockstarDescription: Peds with this flag set won't be allowed to reactivate their ragdoll when hit by a vehicle.
199.rockstarCodeComment: Peds with this flag set won't be allowed to reactivate their ragdoll when hit by a vehicle.

200.name: HasBeenInArmedCombat
200.rockstarDescription: Is set if this ped has ever been in armed combat
200.rockstarCodeComment: True if we've ever been in non-melee combat

201.name: UseDiminishingAmmoRate
201.rockstarDescription: Set for when we want to diminish the ammo at a slower rate. Used specifically in cases where AI do not have infinite ammo.

202.name: Avoidance_Ignore_All
202.rockstarDescription: This ped won't steer around anyone
202.rockstarCodeComment: True if we never steer around peds

203.name: Avoidance_Ignored_by_All
203.rockstarDescription: Other peds won't steer around this ped
203.rockstarCodeComment: True if peds never steer around us

204.name: Avoidance_Ignore_Group1
204.rockstarDescription: This ped won't steer around peds marked group 1
204.rockstarCodeComment: True if we steer around peds that are members of group 1

205.name: Avoidance_Member_of_Group1
205.rockstarDescription: This ped is marked as a member of avoidance group 1
205.rockstarCodeComment: True if we are members of avoidance group 1

206.name: ForcedToUseSpecificGroupSeatIndex
206.rockstarDescription: Ped is forced to use specific seat index set by SET_PED_GROUP_MEMBER_PASSENGER_INDEX
206.rockstarCodeComment: Ped is forced to use specific seat index set by SET_PED_GROUP_MEMBER_PASSENGER_INDEX

207.name: LowPhysicsLodMayPlaceOnNavMesh
207.rockstarDescription: If set, peds in low lod physics will be placed so that their feet rest on the navmesh

208.name: DisableExplosionReactions
208.rockstarDescription: If set, peds will disable all explosion reactions
208.rockstarCodeComment: If set, ped will ignore explosion events

209.name: DodgedPlayer
209.rockstarDescription: Whether this ped has just dodged a player.

210.name: WaitingForPlayerControlInterrupt
210.rockstarDescription: Set when player switches to an ai ped and keeps the scripted task of the ai ped
210.rockstarCodeComment: Set when player switches to an ai ped and keeps the scripted task of the ai ped, if unset we won't check for interrupts or time out

211.name: ForcedToStayInCover
211.rockstarDescription: Ped won't move out of cover when set (not even to fire).
211.rockstarCodeComment: If set, ped will stay in cover (won't come out to fire or move out during combat)

212.name: GeneratesSoundEvents
212.rockstarDescription: Does this ped generate sound events?
212.rockstarCodeComment: Does this ped generate sound events?

213.name: ListensToSoundEvents
213.rockstarDescription: Does this ped have the ability to respond to sound events?
213.rockstarCodeComment: Does this ped have the ability to respond to sound events?

214.name: AllowToBeTargetedInAVehicle
214.rockstarDescription: Ped can be targeting inside a vehicle
214.rockstarCodeComment: Ped can be targeting inside a vehicle

215.name: WaitForDirectEntryPointToBeFreeWhenExiting
215.rockstarCodeComment: When exiting a vehicle, the ped will wait for the direct entry point to be clear before exiting

216.name: OnlyRequireOnePressToExitVehicle
216.rockstarCodeComment: Player doesn't need to hold exit button to exit vehicles

217.name: ForceExitToSkyDive
217.rockstarCodeComment: Force the skydive exit if we're exiting the vehicle

218.name: SteersAroundVehicles
218.rockstarDescription: Enables/disables the low-level steering behaviour around vehicles

219.name: AllowPedInVehiclesOverrideTaskFlags
219.rockstarDescription: If set, allow the ped to be set in vehicles even if the ped's TaskData would otherwise disallow it.

220.name: DontEnterLeadersVehicle
220.rockstarDescription: If set, the ped will not enter the leader's vehicle.

221.name: DisableExitToSkyDive
221.rockstarCodeComment: Disable the skydive exit if we're exiting the vehicle

222.name: ScriptHasDisabledCollision
222.rockstarDescription: Script disabled collision on this ped via SET_ENTITY_COLLISION, this leaves on collision against explosions and weapons

223.name: UseAmbientModelScaling
223.rockstarDescription: This ped is drawn randomly scaled from [0.5,1.0]

224.name: DontWatchFirstOnNextHurryAway
224.rockstarDescription: Hurry away without watching the next time this ped runs CTaskHurryAway.

225.name: DisablePotentialToBeWalkedIntoResponse
225.rockstarDescription: make EVENT_POTENTIAL_BE_WALKED_INTO not affect this ped.

226.name: DisablePedAvoidance
226.rockstarDescription: This ped will not avoid other peds whilst navigating
226.rockstarCodeComment: This ped will not avoid other peds whilst navigating

227.name: ForceRagdollUponDeath
227.rockstarDescription: When the ped dies, it will ragdoll instead of potentially choosing an animated death.
227.rockstarCodeComment: When the ped dies, it will ragdoll instead of potentially choosing an animated death

228.name: CanLosePropsOnDamage
228.rockstarDescription: When ped receives damage any prop glasses could be knocked off

230.name: AllowedToDetachTrailer
230.rockstarDescription: Allow this ped to detach trailers from vehicles
230.rockstarCodeComment: Allow this ped to detach trailers from vehicles

235.name: AllowBlockDeadPedRagdollActivation
235.rockstarDescription: If set, the ragdoll activation blocking flags can be used to disable activation of dead peds. Otherwise, by default, dead peds can always activate their ragdolls

236.name: IsHoldingProp
236.rockstarDescription: True if the ped is currently holding a prop.

237.name: BlocksPathingWhenDead
237.rockstarDescription: When this ped dies their body will block all pathfinding modes - not just wandering.

238.name: ForcePlayNormalScenarioExitOnNextScriptCommand
238.rockstarDescription: The next time this ped leaves a scenario to perform some script task they will be forced into their normal scenario exit.

239.name: ForcePlayImmediateScenarioExitOnNextScriptCommand
239.rockstarDescription: The next time this ped leaves a scneario to perform some script task they will be forced into their immediate (blend out) exit.

240.name: ForceSkinCharacterCloth
240.rockstarDescription: Force character cloth to stay skinned immediately after being created. If flag is not set then character cloth is not forced to be skinned when created.
240.rockstarCodeComment: ForceSkin character cloth on creation when flag is set

241.name: LeaveEngineOnWhenExitingVehicles
241.rockstarDescription: The player will leave the engine running when leaving vehicles
241.rockstarCodeComment: Player will leave the engine on when exiting a vehicle normally

242.name: PhoneDisableTextingAnimations
242.rockstarDescription: tells taskmobile phone to not texting animations.  Currently don't play these in MP
242.rockstarCodeComment: tells taskmobile phone to not texting animations.  Currently don't play these in MP

243.name: PhoneDisableTalkingAnimations
243.rockstarDescription: tells taskmobile phone to not talking animations.  Currently don't play these in MP
243.rockstarCodeComment: tells taskmobile phone to not talking animations.  Currently don't play these in MP

244.name: PhoneDisableCameraAnimations
244.rockstarDescription: tells taskmobile phone to not camera animations.  Currently don't play these in SP
244.rockstarCodeComment: tells taskmobile phone to not camera animations.  Currently don't play these in SP

245.name: DisableBlindFiringInShotReactions
245.rockstarDescription: Stops the ped from accidentally blind firing it's weapon when doing an nm shot reaction
245.rockstarCodeComment: Stops the ped from accidentally firing his weapon when shot.

246.name: AllowNearbyCoverUsage
246.rockstarDescription: This makes it so that OTHER peds are allowed to take cover at points that would otherwise be rejected due to proximity
246.rockstarCodeComment: This makes it so that OTHER peds are allowed to take cover at points that would otherwise be rejected due to proximity

248.name: CanPlayInCarIdles
248.rockstarDescription: If false, blocks in-car idle animations from playing.

249.name: CanAttackNonWantedPlayerAsLaw
249.rockstarDescription: If this is a law ped then it will ignore the player wanted level clean check in combat and continue attacking
249.rockstarCodeComment: If this ped is a law enforcement ped then we will NOT quit combat due to a target player no longer having a wanted level

250.name: WillTakeDamageWhenVehicleCrashes
250.rockstarDescription: Ped gets damaged when the vehicle they are in crashes
250.rockstarCodeComment: If set, this ped will take damage if the car they are in crashes

251.name: AICanDrivePlayerAsRearPassenger
251.rockstarDescription: If this ai ped is driving the vehicle, if the player taps to enter, they will enter as a rear passenger, if they hold, they'll jack the driver
251.rockstarCodeComment: If this ai ped is driving the vehicle, if the player taps to enter, they will enter as a rear passenger, if they hold, they'll jack the driver

252.name: PlayerCanJackFriendlyPlayers
252.rockstarDescription: If a friendly player is driving the vehicle, if the player taps to enter, they will enter as a passenger, if they hold, they'll jack the driver
252.rockstarCodeComment: If a friendly player is driving the vehicle, if the player taps to enter, they will enter as a passenger, if they hold, they'll jack the driver

254.name: SimulatingAiming
254.rockstarDescription: Simulating the aim button for player until on input detection.

255.name: AIDriverAllowFriendlyPassengerSeatEntry
255.rockstarDescription: If this ai ped is driving the vehicle, allow players to get in passenger seats
255.rockstarCodeComment: If this ai ped is driving the vehicle, allow players to get in passenger seats

256.name: ParentCarIsBeingRemoved
256.rockstarDescription: Set on the target ped if the car they are in is being removed to avoid an expensive detach check

257.name: AllowMissionPedToUseInjuredMovement
257.rockstarDescription: Set the target ped to be allowed to use Injured movement clips

258.name: CanLoseHelmetOnDamage
258.rockstarDescription: When ped receives a head shot then a helmet can be knocked off

259.name: NeverDoScenarioExitProbeChecks
259.rockstarDescription: When this ped exits a scenario they ignore probe checks against the environment and just pick an exit clip.
259.rockstarCodeComment: Set the target ped to be allowed to use Injured movement clips

260.name: SuppressLowLODRagdollSwitchWhenCorpseSettles
260.rockstarDescription: This will suppress the automatic switch to a lower ragdoll LOD when switching to the ragdoll frame after dying.

261.name: PreventUsingLowerPrioritySeats
261.rockstarDescription: Don't use certain seats (like hanging on the side of a vehicle)
261.rockstarCodeComment: Don't use certain seats (like hanging on the side of a vehicle)

262.name: JustLeftVehicleNeedsReset
262.rockstarDescription: Set when leaving a vehicle and disabling collision with the vehicle exiting to indicate we need to clear out the disabling

263.name: TeleportIfCantReachPlayer
263.rockstarDescription: If this ped is following the player and stuck in a place where he can't be reached, teleport when possible.

264.name: PedsInVehiclePositionNeedsReset
264.rockstarDescription: Ped was being jacked/killed but isn't anymore, ensure they're in the seat

265.name: PedsFullyInSeat
265.rockstarDescription: Ped is fully in the seat (Set after the position needs reset flag)

266.name: AllowPlayerLockOnIfFriendly
266.rockstarDescription: If this ped is friendly with the player, this will allow the ped to lockon

267.name: UseCameraHeadingForDesiredDirectionLockOnTest
267.rockstarDescription: Force camera direction for heading test if desired direction is also set

268.name: TeleportToLeaderVehicle
268.rockstarDescription: If set, teleport if ped is not in the leader's vehicle before TaskEnterVehicle::m_SecondsBeforeWarpToLeader.
268.rockstarCodeComment: If set, teleport if ped is not in the leader's vehicle before TaskEnterVehicle::m_SecondsBeforeWarpToLeader.

269.name: Avoidance_Ignore_WeirdPedBuffer
269.rockstarDescription: Don't give weird peds extra buffer
269.rockstarCodeComment: Don't walk extra far around weird peds like trevor

270.name: OnStairSlope
270.rockstarDescription: Are we on a stair slope?

271.name: HasPlayedNMGetup
271.rockstarDescription: This ped has gotten up from NM at least once.

272.name: DontBlipCop
272.rockstarDescription: Wanted system shouldnt consider this ped when creating blips.
272.rockstarCodeComment: Don't add a blip for this cop

273.name: SpawnedAtExtendedRangeScenario
273.rockstarDescription: Set if the ped spawned at a scenario with extended range.

274.name: WalkAlongsideLeaderWhenClose
274.rockstarDescription: This ped will walk alongside group leader if they are the first member of the leader's pedgroup, they are close enough to the leader, and the pedgroup's formation is set up to allow this (such as in the default CPedFormationTypes::FORMATION_LOOSE).

275.name: KillWhenTrapped
275.rockstarDescription: This will kill a mission ped that becomes trapped (like under a cow carcass) and cannot getup.
275.rockstarCodeComment: Kill this ped if it becomes trapped and cannot get up

276.name: EdgeDetected
276.rockstarDescription: If this flag is set on a ped it has detected an edge

277.name: AlwaysWakeUpPhysicsOfIntersectedPeds
277.rockstarDescription: This ped will cause physics to activate on any ped this ped's capsule is inside of, even if this ped is being attached.

278.name: EquippedAmbientLoadOutWeapon
278.rockstarDescription: This is set to prevent a ped from holstering a loadout weapon equipped during CPedPopulation::EquipPed as part of the defined CAmbientPedModelVariations' loadout.

279.name: AvoidTearGas
279.rockstarDescription: If set, a ped will avoid tear gas.
279.rockstarCodeComment: If set, this ped will avoid tear gas

280.name: StoppedSpeechUponFreezing
280.rockstarDescription: Marks that we've already dealt with cleaning up speech audio after becoming frozen.

281.name: DisableGoToWritheWhenInjured
281.rockstarDescription: If set, CPed::DAMAGED_GOTOWRITHE will no longer get set.  In particular, tazer hits wil no longer kill this ped in one hit.
281.rockstarCodeComment: If set, CPed::DAMAGED_GOTOWRITHE will no longer get set.  In particular, tazer hits wil no longer kill this ped in one hit

282.name: OnlyUseForcedSeatWhenEnteringHeliInGroup
282.rockstarDescription: If set this ped will only use their forced seat index if the vehicle they're entering is a heli as part of a group
282.rockstarCodeComment: If set this ped will only use their forced seat index if the vehicle they're entering is a heli as part of a group

283.name: ThrownFromVehicleDueToExhaustion
283.rockstarDescription: Ped got tired and was thrown from bike. Used to scale ragdoll damage for a few seconds after the dismount.

284.name: UpdateEnclosedSearchRegion
284.rockstarDescription: This ped will update their enclosed regions

286.name: ShouldChargeNow
286.rockstarDescription: This ped should charge if in combat right away, for use by scripts, cleared once ped charges
286.rockstarCodeComment: This ped should charge if in combat right away, for use by scripts, cleared once ped charges

287.name: RagdollingOnBoat
287.rockstarDescription: We don't want ragdolling peds processing buoyancy when in a boat.

289.name: AllowMinorReactionsAsMissionPed
289.rockstarDescription: If true, this ped will react to events such as being hit by a vehicle as a mission ped

290.name: BlockDeadBodyShockingEventsWhenDead
290.rockstarDescription: If true, this ped will not generate dead body shocking events when dead.

291.name: PedHasBeenSeen
291.rockstarDescription: True if the ped has be visible to the player

292.name: PedIsInReusePool
292.rockstarDescription: True if the ped is currently in the ped reuse pool

293.name: PedWasReused
293.rockstarDescription: True if the ped was in the reuse pool and then was reused

294.name: DisableShockingEvents
294.rockstarCodeComment: This ped should ignore shocking events.

295.name: MovedUsingLowLodPhysicsSinceLastActive
295.rockstarDescription: Set for peds that have moved using low LOD physics

296.name: NeverReactToPedOnRoof
296.rockstarDescription: If true, this ped will not react to a ped standing on the roof.
296.rockstarCodeComment: If true, this ped will not react to a ped standing on the roof

297.name: ForcePlayFleeScenarioExitOnNextScriptCommand
297.rockstarDescription: If set this ped will use a flee exit to leave on the next script command.

298.name: JustBumpedIntoVehicle
298.rockstarDescription: Set for peds that just bumped into a vehicle

299.name: DisableShockingDrivingOnPavementEvents
299.rockstarCodeComment: If true, this ped will not react to peds driving on pavement

300.name: ShouldThrowSmokeNow
300.rockstarDescription: This ped should throw a smoke grenade in combat right away, for use by scripts, cleared once ped throws
300.rockstarCodeComment: This ped should throw a smoke grenade in combat right away, for use by scripts, cleared once ped throws

301.name: DisablePedConstraints
301.rockstarDescription: Flags the ped to ensure it either does or does not have its control constraints

302.name: ForceInitialPeekInCover
302.rockstarDescription: If set, ped will peek once before firing in cover. Cleared upon peeking.
302.rockstarCodeComment: If set, ped will peek once before firing in cover. Cleared upon peeking.

303.name: CreatedByDispatch
303.rockstarDescription: this ped was created by one of the dispatch systems, usually law enforcement

304.name: PointGunLeftHandSupporting
304.rockstarDescription: NM state config flag. Set to true when the characters support hand has broken from the weapon

305.name: DisableJumpingFromVehiclesAfterLeader
305.rockstarDescription: If true, ped will not bail out of a vehicle after his group leader.
305.rockstarCodeComment: If true, disable followers jumping out of cars after their group leader

306.name: DontActivateRagdollFromPlayerPedImpact
306.rockstarDescription: Blocks ragdoll activation from animated player ped bumps

307.name: DontActivateRagdollFromAiRagdollImpact
307.rockstarDescription: Blocks ragdoll activation from collisions with ai ragdolls

308.name: DontActivateRagdollFromPlayerRagdollImpact
308.rockstarDescription: Blocks ragdoll activation from collisions with a ragdolling player

309.name: DisableQuadrupedSpring
309.rockstarDescription: Use to disable quadruped spring processing when settling from a ragdoll performance

310.name: IsInCluster
310.rockstarDescription: This ped is currently in a cluster.

311.name: ShoutToGroupOnPlayerMelee
311.rockstarDescription: If set, ped will shout target position when melee attacked by a player
311.rockstarCodeComment: If set, ped will shout target position when melee attacked by a player

312.name: IgnoredByAutoOpenDoors
312.rockstarDescription: Set this for a ped to be ignored by the auto opened doors when checking to see if the door should be opened.
312.rockstarCodeComment: Set this for a ped to be ignored by the auto opened doors when checking to see if the door should be opened.

313.name: PreferInjuredGetup
313.rockstarDescription: Set this during nm tasks to trigger an injured geup when the ped gets up.

314.name: ForceIgnoreMeleeActiveCombatant
314.rockstarDescription: Purposely ignore the melee active combatant role and push them into a support or inactive combatant role
314.rockstarCodeComment: Purposely ignore the melee active combatant role and push them into a support or inactive combatant role

315.name: CheckLoSForSoundEvents
315.rockstarDescription: If set, ped will ignore sound events generated by entites it can't see.
315.rockstarCodeComment: If set, ped will ignore sound events generated by entites it can't see.

316.name: JackedAbandonedCar
316.rockstarDescription: This ped was spawned to steal an ambient car that was left around

317.name: CanSayFollowedByPlayerAudio
317.rockstarDescription: If set, ped can play FRIEND_FOLLOWED_BY_PLAYER lines.
317.rockstarCodeComment: If set, ped can play FRIEND_FOLLOWED_BY_PLAYER lines.

318.name: ActivateRagdollFromMinorPlayerContact
318.rockstarDescription: If set, the ped will activate the nm ragdoll balance as soon as he's touhed by the player (ignoring velocity thresholds).
318.rockstarCodeComment: If set, the ped will activate ragdoll much more easily on contact with the player

319.name: HasPortablePickupAttached
319.rockstarDescription: If set, the ped is carrying a portable pickuup.

320.name: ForcePoseCharacterCloth
320.rockstarDescription: If set, default cloth pose will be applied if is available in the character cloth when the cloth is created.
320.rockstarCodeComment: Default cloth pose will be applied if is available in the character cloth when the cloth is created

321.name: HasClothCollisionBounds
321.rockstarDescription: If set, ped will use cloth collision bounds.

322.name: HasHighHeels
322.rockstarDescription: Set when the ped has high heels

323.name: TreatAsAmbientPedForDriverLockOn
323.rockstarDescription: If set, this force player ped to treat this ped as an ambient target rather than a mission ped for driver lock on

324.name: DontBehaveLikeLaw
324.rockstarDescription: Currently used to prevent security peds from behaving like police (they will not report wanted position, can attack without WL, etc)
324.rockstarCodeComment: If set on a non-law ped that has law like behavior (i.e. security) then that ped will not use the law like behaviors/logic

325.name: SpawnedAtScenario
325.rockstarDescription: If set, the ped was originally spawned at a scenario point.

326.name: DisablePoliceInvestigatingBody
326.rockstarDescription: If set, police will not perform the CTaskShockingPoliceInvestigate Behavior on the ped
326.rockstarCodeComment: If set, police will not perform the CTaskShockingPoliceInvestigate behavior on the ped

327.name: DisableWritheShootFromGround
327.rockstarDescription: If set, the ped will no longer shoot while writhing.
327.rockstarCodeComment: If set, the ped will no longer shoot while writhing

328.name: LowerPriorityOfWarpSeats
328.rockstarCodeComment: If set the ped will only just the warp entry points if there are no animated entry points available

329.name: DisableTalkTo
329.rockstarCodeComment: If set the ped can't be talked to

330.name: DontBlip
330.rockstarDescription: Stops a ped being blipped by the wanted system
330.rockstarCodeComment: If set the ped will not be blipped by the wanted system

331.name: IsSwitchingWeapon
331.rockstarDescription: ped is running the swap weapon task

332.name: IgnoreLegIkRestrictions
332.rockstarDescription: If set, the ped will ignore leg IK request restrictions for non-player peds.
332.rockstarCodeComment: If set, the ped will ignore leg IK request restrictions for non-player peds

333.name: ScriptForceNoTimesliceIntelligenceUpdate
333.rockstarDescription: If set, the ped will never have their intelligence update time sliced across frames.
333.rockstarCodeComment: If set, the ped will never have their intelligence update time sliced across frames.

334.name: JackedOutOfMyVehicle
334.rockstarDescription: If set, this ped has been jacked out of its vehicle.

335.name: WentIntoCombatAfterBeingJacked
335.rockstarDescription: If set, this ped went into combat because of being jacked.

336.name: DontActivateRagdollForVehicleGrab
336.rockstarDescription: Blocks ragdoll activation when grabbing vehicle doors

337.name: ForcePackageCharacterCloth
337.rockstarDescription: Set the flag for forcing package on character cloth when cloth is created on the ped

339.name: AllowTaskDoNothingTimeslicing
339.rockstarDescription: If set, this ped will timeslice it's DoNothing Task when computing default task.
339.rockstarCodeComment: If set, this ped will timeslice it's DoNothing Task when computing default task.

341.name: ForceProneCharacterCloth
341.rockstarDescription: Set the flag to place character cloth in prone state when cloth is created on the ped

342.name: NotAllowedToJackAnyPlayers
342.rockstarCodeComment: If set, this ped will not be allowed to jack any other players (not synced)

345.name: AlwaysLeaveTrainUponArrival
345.rockstarDescription: Does this ped always (not randomly) leave the train when it arrives at a station
345.rockstarCodeComment: If set, this ped will always exit the train when it stops at a station.

346.name: ForcePlayDirectedNormalScenarioExitOnNextScriptCommand
346.rockstarDescription: Set flag to determine that a directed normal exit should be use for new tasks on this scenario ped.

347.name: OnlyWritheFromWeaponDamage
347.rockstarDescription: Only allow ped to writhe from weapon damage, not from other stuff, like small vehicle impacts
347.rockstarCodeComment: If set, Only allow ped to wrothe from weapon damage, not from other stuff, like small vehicle impacts

348.name: UseSloMoBloodVfx
348.rockstarDescription: Flags the ped to use the slo mo blood vfx instead of the normal ones
348.rockstarCodeComment: If set, this ped will use slo mo blood vfx instead of the normal ones (these effects must be included in the script particle asset)

349.name: EquipJetpack
349.rockstarDescription: Equip/put on the jetpack if we have one in our inventory

350.name: PreventDraggedOutOfCarThreatResponse
350.rockstarDescription: Don't do threat response when dragged out of a car
350.rockstarCodeComment: Don't do threat response when dragged out of a car

351.name: ScriptHasCompletelyDisabledCollision
351.rockstarDescription: Script has completely disabled collision on this ped via SET_ENTITY_COMPLETELY_DISABLE_COLLISION

352.name: NeverDoScenarioNavChecks
352.rockstarDescription: This ped will not check for navmesh when exiting their scenario.

353.name: ForceSynchronousScenarioExitChecking
353.rockstarDescription: This ped will expensively probe for a scenario exit location in one frame.

354.name: ThrowingGrenadeWhileAiming
354.rockstarDescription: Set true in CTaskAimGunOnFoot::Aiming_OnUpdate, false in CTaskAimAndThrowProjectile::CleanUp.

356.name: ForceDeepSurfaceCheck
356.rockstarDescription: Don't do distance from camera culling of the deep surface check, needed for detecting snow, mud, etc.
356.rockstarCodeComment: Don't do distance from camera culling of the deep surface check, needed for detecting snow, mud, etc.

357.name: DisableDeepSurfaceAnims
357.rockstarDescription: Disable deep surface anims to prevent them slowing ped down
357.rockstarCodeComment: Disable deep surface anims to prevent them slowing ped down.

358.name: DontBlipNotSynced
358.rockstarDescription: Don't blip this ped, this is not synced over the network to allow script to individually control a peds blippedness on different machines
358.rockstarCodeComment: If set the ped will not be blipped by the wanted system, this will not be synced and be set on clones so the behaviour can be changed per player

359.name: IsDuckingInVehicle
359.rockstarDescription: Ped is ducking inside a vehicle.
359.rockstarCodeComment: Query only, see if the ped is ducking in a vehicle

360.name: PreventAutoShuffleToTurretSeat
360.rockstarCodeComment: If set the ped will not automatically shuffle to the turret seat when it becomes free

361.name: DisableEventInteriorStatusCheck
361.rockstarDescription: Disables the ignore events based on interior status check which normally has peds inside ignore events from outside
361.rockstarCodeComment: Disables the ignore events based on interior status check which normally has peds inside ignore events from outside

362.name: HasReserveParachute
362.rockstarDescription: Does ped have a reserve chute that they can deploy

364.name: TreatDislikeAsHateWhenInCombat
364.rockstarDescription: If this ped is in combat then any ped they dislike they will consider the relationship hate instead
364.rockstarCodeComment: If the ped this is set on is in combat then any dislike feeling they have towards other peds will be treated as a hate feeling

365.name: OnlyUpdateTargetWantedIfSeen
365.rockstarDescription: If the target is a player we will only set the WL or update the radar if they are seen
365.rockstarCodeComment: Law with this set will only update the WL is the target player is seen. This includes on combat initialization as well as during normal LOS checks (ignoring "last known position" reports)

366.name: AllowAutoShuffleToDriversSeat
366.rockstarDescription: Allows this ped to auto shuffle to the driver seat of a vehicle if the driver is dead (law and MP peds would do this normally)
366.rockstarCodeComment: Allows this ped to auto shuffle to the driver seat of a vehicle if the driver is dead (law and MP peds would do this normally)

367.name: DontActivateRagdollFromSmokeGrenade
367.rockstarDescription: Blocks ragdoll activation when damaged by smoke grenade

368.name: LinkMBRToOwnerOnChain
368.rockstarDescription: This ped will attempt to match the speed of the owner while following its current scenario chain.

369.name: AmbientFriendBumpedByPlayer
369.rockstarDescription: The player has walked into our ambient friend.

370.name: AmbientFriendBumpedByPlayerVehicle
370.rockstarDescription: The player has driven into our ambient friend.

371.name: InFPSUnholsterTransition
371.rockstarDescription: Player is playing the unholster transition in FPS mode

372.name: PreventReactingToSilencedCloneBullets
372.rockstarDescription: Prevents the ped from reacting to silenced bullets fired from network clone peds
372.rockstarCodeComment: If set prevents the ped from reacting to silenced bullets fired from network clone peds (use for peds where stealth kills are important)

373.name: DisableInjuredCryForHelpEvents
373.rockstarDescription: Blocks ped from creating the injured cry for help events (run over, tazed or melee would usually do this)
373.rockstarCodeComment: Blocks ped from creating the injured cry for help events (run over, tazed or melee would usually do this)

374.name: NeverLeaveTrain
374.rockstarDescription: Prevents peds riding trains from getting off them
374.rockstarCodeComment: Prevents peds riding trains from getting off them

375.name: DontDropJetpackOnDeath
375.rockstarDescription: When dead, don't drop eqquiped jetpack
375.rockstarCodeComment: Prevents ped dropping jetpack when they die

376.name: UseFPSUnholsterTransitionDuringCombatRoll
376.rockstarDescription: Player is playing the unholster transition in FPS mode

377.name: ExitingFPSCombatRoll
377.rockstarDescription: Player is exiting combat roll in FPS mode

378.name: ScriptHasControlOfPlayer
378.rockstarDescription: True when script is controlling the movement of the player

379.name: PlayFPSIdleFidgetsForProjectile
379.rockstarDescription: True when we should be playing idle fidgets for projectiles

380.name: DisableAutoEquipHelmetsInBikes
380.rockstarCodeComment: Prevents ped from auto-equipping helmets when entering a bike (includes quadbikes)

381.name: DisableAutoEquipHelmetsInAircraft
381.rockstarCodeComment: Prevents ped from auto-equipping helmets when entering an aircraft

382.name: WasPlayingFPSGetup
382.rockstarDescription: Was playing getup animations in FPS mode

383.name: WasPlayingFPSMeleeActionResult
383.rockstarDescription: Was playing action result animations in FPS mode

384.name: PreferNoPriorityRemoval
384.rockstarDescription: Unless scenario conditions apply, make this ped go through normal deletion but not priority deletion.

385.name: FPSFidgetsAbortedOnFire
385.rockstarDescription: True when the FPS idle fidgets are aborted because the player fired the gun

386.name: ForceFPSIKWithUpperBodyAnim
386.rockstarDescription: True when upper body anims are used during various tasks.

387.name: SwitchingCharactersInFirstPerson
387.rockstarDescription: True we switch a character in first person mode (in CGameWorld::ChangePlayerPed)

388.name: IsClimbingLadder
388.rockstarDescription: True when the ped is climbing a ladder

389.name: HasBareFeet
389.rockstarDescription: Set when the ped has no shoes
389.rockstarCodeComment: Flag to indicate that player has no shoes(used for first person aiming camera)

391.name: GoOnWithoutVehicleIfItIsUnableToGetBackToRoad
391.rockstarDescription: It will force the ped to abandon its vehicle (when using TaskGoToPointAnyMeans) if it is unable to get back to road
391.rockstarCodeComment: It will force the ped to abandon its vehicle (when using TaskGoToPointAnyMeans) if it is unable to get back to road

392.name: BlockDroppingHealthSnacksOnDeath
392.rockstarDescription: Set by script to prevent peds from dropping snack health pickups on death (in CPed::CreateDeadPedPickups).
392.rockstarCodeComment: This will block health pickups from being created when the ped dies.

393.name: ResetLastVehicleOnVehicleExit
393.rockstarDescription: Reset the ped's stored MyVehicle pointer when this ped leaves their vehicle.

394.name: ForceThreatResponseToNonFriendToFriendMeleeActions
394.rockstarDescription: Forces threat response to melee actions from non friend to friend peds.
394.rockstarCodeComment: Forces threat response to melee actions from non friend to friend peds.

395.name: DontRespondToRandomPedsDamage
395.rockstarDescription: Do not respond to random peds damage
395.rockstarCodeComment: Do not respond to random peds damage.

396.name: AllowContinuousThreatResponseWantedLevelUpdates
396.rockstarDescription: Shares logic of OnlyUpdateTargetWantedIfSeen but will continue to check even after the initial WL is set
396.rockstarCodeComment: Shares the same logic of PCF_OnlyUpdateTargetWantedIfSeen but will continue to check even after the initial WL is set

397.name: KeepTargetLossResponseOnCleanup
397.rockstarDescription: On cleanup the ped will not reset their target loss response
397.rockstarCodeComment: The target loss response will not be reset to exit task on cleanup if this is set

398.name: PlayersDontDragMeOutOfCar
398.rockstarDescription: Similar to DontDragMeOutCar except it only prevents players from dragging the ped out and allows AI to still do so
398.rockstarCodeComment: Similar to DontDragMeOutCar except it will still allow AI to drag the ped out of a vehicle

399.name: BroadcastRepondedToThreatWhenGoingToPointShooting
399.rockstarDescription: Whenever the ped starts shooting while going to a point, it trigger a responded to threat broadcast
399.rockstarCodeComment: Whenever the ped starts shooting while going to a point, it trigger a responded to threat broadcast

400.name: IgnorePedTypeForIsFriendlyWith
400.rockstarDescription: If this is set then IsFriendlyWith will ignore the ped type checks (i.e. two PEDTYPE_COP peds are not automatically friendly)
400.rockstarCodeComment: If this is set then IsFriendlyWith will ignore the ped type checks (i.e. two PEDTYPE_COP peds are not automatically friendly)

401.name: TreatNonFriendlyAsHateWhenInCombat
401.rockstarDescription: Any non friendly ped will be considered as hated instead
401.rockstarCodeComment: Any non friendly ped will be considered as hated instead when in combat

402.name: DontLeaveVehicleIfLeaderNotInVehicle
402.rockstarDescription: Supresses exit vehicle task being created in CEventLeaderExitedCarAsDriver::CreateResponseTask.
402.rockstarCodeComment: Supresses "LeaderExistedCarAsDriver" events. Ped won't exit vehicle if leader isn't in it as well.

403.name: ChangeFromPermanentToAmbientPopTypeOnMigration
403.rockstarDescription: Change ped to ambient pop type on migration.

404.name: AllowMeleeReactionIfMeleeProofIsOn
404.rockstarDescription: Allow melee reaction to come through even if proof is on
404.rockstarCodeComment: Allow melee reaction to come through even if proof is on

405.name: UsingLowriderLeans
405.rockstarDescription: Ped is playing lowrider lean animations due to vehicle suspension modification.

406.name: UsingAlternateLowriderLeans
406.rockstarDescription: Ped is playing alternate lowrider lean animations (ie arm on window) due to vehicle suspension modification.

407.name: UseNormalExplosionDamageWhenBlownUpInVehicle
407.rockstarDescription: If this is set, the ped won't be instantly killed if vehicle is blown up (from CAutomobile::BlowUpCar -> KillPedsInVehicle). Instead, they will take normal explosive damage and be forced to exit the vehicle if they're still alive.
407.rockstarCodeComment: If this is set, ped won't be instantly killed if vehicle is blown up. Instead, they will take normal explosive damage and be forced to exit the vehicle if they're still alive.

408.name: DisableHomingMissileLockForVehiclePedInside
408.rockstarDescription: Blocks locking on of the vehicle that the ped is inside.
408.rockstarCodeComment: Blocks locking on of the vehicle that the ped is inside.

409.name: DisableTakeOffScubaGear
409.rockstarDescription: Same as CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableTakeOffScubaGear but on a config flag.
409.rockstarCodeComment: Disable taking off the scuba gear. Same as PRF_DisableTakeOffScubaGear but on a config flag.

410.name: IgnoreMeleeFistWeaponDamageMult
410.rockstarDescription: Melee fist weapons (ie knuckle duster) won't apply relative health damage scaler (m_MeleeRightFistTargetHealthDamageScaler in weapon info).
410.rockstarCodeComment: Melee fist weapons (ie knuckle duster) won't apply relative health damage scaler (MeleeRightFistTargetHealthDamageScaler in weapon info).

411.name: LawPedsCanFleeFromNonWantedPlayer
411.rockstarDescription: Allows law ped to flee even if ped is not wanted and CWanted::m_AllRandomsFlee is set.
411.rockstarCodeComment: Law peds will be triggered to flee if player triggers an appropriate event (even if ped is not wanted) instead of entering combat. NB: Only synced over the network when set on players.

412.name: ForceBlipSecurityPedsIfPlayerIsWanted
412.rockstarDescription: Forces security peds (not cop peds) to be blipped on the minimap if the player is wanted. Set on the local player.
412.rockstarCodeComment: Forces security peds (not cop peds) to be blipped on the minimap if the player is wanted. Set this on the local player.

413.name: IsHolsteringWeapon
413.rockstarDescription: Ped is running the swap weapon task and holstering the previous weapon, but has not started drawing the new one.

414.name: UseGoToPointForScenarioNavigation
414.rockstarDescription: Don't use nav mesh for navigating to scenario points. DLC Hack for yachts
414.rockstarCodeComment: Don't use nav mesh for navigating to scenario points. DLC Hack for yachts

415.name: DontClearLocalPassengersWantedLevel
415.rockstarDescription: Don't clear local ped's wanted level when remote ped in the same car has his wanted level cleared by script.
415.rockstarCodeComment: Don't clear local ped's wanted level when remote ped in the same car has his wanted level cleared by script.

416.name: BlockAutoSwapOnWeaponPickups
416.rockstarDescription: Block auto weapon swaps for weapon pickups.
416.rockstarCodeComment: Block auto weapon swaps for weapon pickups.

417.name: ThisPedIsATargetPriorityForAI
417.rockstarDescription: Increase AI targeting score for peds with this flag.
417.rockstarCodeComment: Increase AI targeting score for peds with this flag.

418.name: IsSwitchingHelmetVisor
418.rockstarDescription: Indicates that ped is playing switch visor up/down anim
418.rockstarCodeComment: Indicates ped is using switch helmet visor up/down anim

419.name: ForceHelmetVisorSwitch
419.rockstarDescription: Forces ped to do a visor helmet switch if able to.
419.rockstarCodeComment: Indicates ped is using switch helmet visor up/down anim

420.name: IsPerformingVehicleMelee
420.rockstarDescription: Indicates that ped is performing vehicle melee action.

421.name: UseOverrideFootstepPtFx
421.rockstarDescription: The ped should use any override footstep effects that are set up.
421.rockstarCodeComment: Overrides ped footstep particle effects with the overriden footstep effect

423.name: TreatAsFriendlyForTargetingAndDamage
423.rockstarDescription: Prevents this ped from being locked on and blocks ability to damage / fire at ped.

424.name: AllowBikeAlternateAnimations
424.rockstarDescription: Allows players on motorcycles to use the alternate animation set when available.
424.rockstarCodeComment: Allows transition into bike alternate animations (PI menu option)

425.name: TreatAsFriendlyForTargetingAndDamageNonSynced
425.rockstarDescription: Prevents this ped from being locked on and blocks ability to damage / fire at ped. This flag is not synced, so will only work on machine that set it

426.name: UseLockpickVehicleEntryAnimations
426.rockstarDescription: When set, will attempt to use lockpick animations designed for Franklin in SP mode when breaking into a car.
426.rockstarCodeComment: Use Franklin's alternate lockpicking animations for forced entry

427.name: IgnoreInteriorCheckForSprinting
427.rockstarDescription: When set, player will be able to sprint inside interriors even if it is tagged to prevent it.
427.rockstarCodeComment: When set, player will be able to sprint inside interriors even if it is tagged to prevent it.

428.name: SwatHeliSpawnWithinLastSpottedLocation
428.rockstarDescription: When set, swat helicopters will spawn within last spotted location instead of actual ped location (and target is a player).
428.rockstarCodeComment: When set, swat helicopters will spawn within last spotted location instead of actual ped location (and target is a player)

429.name: DisableStartEngine
429.rockstarDescription: prevents ped from playing start engine anims (and turning engine on)
429.rockstarCodeComment: Prevents ped from playing start engine anims (and turning engine on)

430.name: IgnoreBeingOnFire
430.rockstarDescription: makes ped ignore being on fire (fleeing, reacting to CEventOnFire event)
430.rockstarCodeComment: Makes ped ignore being on fire (fleeing, reacting to CEventOnFire event)

431.name: DisableTurretOrRearSeatPreference
431.rockstarDescription: Disables turret seat and activity seat preference for vehicle entry for local player
431.rockstarCodeComment: Disables turret seat and activity seat preference for vehicle entry for local player

432.name: DisableWantedHelicopterSpawning
432.rockstarDescription: Will not spawn wanted helicopters to chase after this target
432.rockstarCodeComment: Will not spawn wanted helicopters to chase after this target

433.name: UseTargetPerceptionForCreatingAimedAtEvents
433.rockstarDescription: Will only create aimed at events if player is within normal perception of the target
433.rockstarCodeComment: Will only create aimed at events if player is within normal perception of the target

434.name: DisableHomingMissileLockon
434.rockstarDescription: Will prevent homing lockon on this ped
434.rockstarCodeComment: Will prevent homing lockon on this ped

435.name: ForceIgnoreMaxMeleeActiveSupportCombatants
435.rockstarDescription: Ignore max number of active support combatants and let ped join them as such
435.rockstarCodeComment: Ignore max number of active support combatants and let ped join them as such

436.name: StayInDefensiveAreaWhenInVehicle
436.rockstarDescription: Will try to stay within set defensive area while driving a vehicle
436.rockstarCodeComment: Will try to stay within set defensive area while driving a vehicle

437.name: DontShoutTargetPosition
437.rockstarDescription: Will prevent the ped from communicating target position to all other friendly peds
437.rockstarCodeComment: Will prevent the ped from communicating target position to all other friendly peds

438.name: DisableHelmetArmor
438.rockstarDescription: Will apply full headshot damage, regardless if ped has a helmet (or armored one)
438.rockstarCodeComment: Will apply full headshot damage, regardless if ped has a helmet (or armored one)

439.name: CreatedByConcealedPlayer
439.rockstarDescription: Marks a ped that was created by concealed player from marked up scenarios

441.name: PreventVehExitDueToInvalidWeapon
441.rockstarDescription: Will prevent ped from automatically being forced out of vehicle due to weapon being invalid (e.g. turret seats after going into water)
441.rockstarCodeComment: Will prevent ped from automatically being forced out of vehicle due to weapon being invalid (e.g. turret seats after going into water)

442.name: IgnoreNetSessionFriendlyFireCheckForAllowDamage
442.rockstarDescription: Will ignore the friendly fire setting set by NETWORK_SET_FRIENDLY_FIRE_OPTION when checking if ped can be damaged
442.rockstarCodeComment: Will ignore the friendly fire setting set by NETWORK_SET_FRIENDLY_FIRE_OPTION when checking if ped can be damaged

443.name: DontLeaveCombatIfTargetPlayerIsAttackedByPolice
443.rockstarDescription: Will make ped stay in combat even if the player hes targeting starts being attacked by cops
443.rockstarCodeComment: Will make ped stay in combat even if the player hes targeting starts being attacked by cops

444.name: CheckLockedBeforeWarp
444.rockstarDescription: Will check when entering a vehicle if it is locked before warping
444.rockstarCodeComment: Will check when entering a vehicle if it is locked before warping

445.name: DontShuffleInVehicleToMakeRoom
445.rockstarDescription: Will prevent a player from shuffling across to make room if another player is entering from the same side
445.rockstarCodeComment: Will prevent a player from shuffling across to make room if another player is entering from the same side

446.name: GiveWeaponOnGetup
446.rockstarDescription: Will give the ped a weapon to use once their weapon is removed for getups
446.rockstarCodeComment: Will give the ped a weapon to use once their weapon is removed for getups

447.name: DontHitVehicleWithProjectiles
447.rockstarDescription: Ped fired projectiles will ignore the vehicle they are in
447.rockstarCodeComment: Ped fired projectiles will ignore the vehicle they are in

448.name: DisableForcedEntryForOpenVehiclesFromTryLockedDoor
448.rockstarDescription: Will prevent ped from forcing entry into cars that are open from TryLockedDoor state
448.rockstarCodeComment: Will prevent ped from forcing entry into cars that are open from TryLockedDoor state

449.name: FiresDummyRockets
449.rockstarDescription: This ped will fire rockets that explode when close to its target, and won't affect it
449.rockstarCodeComment: his ped will fire rockets that explode when close to its target, and won't affect it

450.name: PedIsArresting
450.rockstarDescription: Is the ped currently preforming an arrest

451.name: IsDecoyPed
451.rockstarDescription: Will make this ped a decoy ped that will focus targeting
451.rockstarCodeComment: Will make this ped a decoy ped that will focus targeting

452.name: HasEstablishedDecoy
452.rockstarDescription: This ped has created a decoy
452.rockstarCodeComment: This ped has created a decoy

453.name: BlockDispatchedHelicoptersFromLanding
453.rockstarDescription: Will prevent dispatched helicopters from landing and dropping off peds
453.rockstarCodeComment: Will prevent dispatched helicopters from landing and dropping off peds

454.name: DontCryForHelpOnStun
454.rockstarDescription: Will prevent peds from crying for help when shot with the stun gun
454.rockstarCodeComment: Will prevent peds from crying for help when shot with the stun gun

455.name: HitByTranqWeapon
455.rockstarDescription: Tranq weapons are handled differently in terms of damage. This triggers that logic

456.name: CanBeIncapacitated
456.rockstarDescription: If set, the ped may be incapacitated
456.rockstarCodeComment: If set, the ped may be incapacitated

457.name: ForcedAimFromArrest
457.rockstarDescription: If set, we will always behave like we have the aim trigger pressed

458.name: DontChangeTargetFromMelee
458.rockstarDescription: If set, we wont set a new target after a melee attack
458.rockstarCodeComment: If set, we wont set a new target after a melee attack

459.name: DisableHealthRegenerationWhenStunned
459.rockstarDescription: Used to disable health regeneration when damaged with the stun gun in MP

460.name: RagdollFloatsIndefinitely
460.rockstarDescription: Prevents a dead ped from sinking
460.rockstarCodeComment: Prevents a dead ped from sinking
